Round.name: Round
Round.effect: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

Echoed Voice.name: Echoed Voice
Echoed Voice.effect: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage.

Chip Away.name: Chip Away
Chip Away.effect: Looking for an opening, the user strikes continually. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

Clear Smog.name: Clear Smog
Clear Smog.effect: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All status changes are returned to normal.

Stored Power.name: Stored Power
Stored Power.effect: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the damage.

Scald.name: Scald
Scald.effect: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Hex.name: Hex
Hex.effect: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems.

Sky Drop.name: Sky Drop
Sky Drop.effect: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

Circle Throw.name: Circle Throw
Circle Throw.effect: The user throws the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

Incinerate.name: Incinerate
Incinerate.effect: The user attacks the target with fire. If the target is holding a Berry, the Berry becomes burnt up and unusable.

Acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
Acrobatics.effect: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

Retaliate.name: Retaliate
Retaliate.effect: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack’s damage increases.

Final Gambit.name: Final Gambit
Final Gambit.effect: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to the user’s HP.

Inferno.name: Inferno
Inferno.effect: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.

Water Pledge.name: Water Pledge
Water Pledge.effect: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, the damage increases and a rainbow appears.

Fire Pledge.name: Fire Pledge
Fire Pledge.effect: A column of fire hits opposing Pokémon. When used with its Grass equivalent, its damage increases into a vast sea of fire.

Grass Pledge.name: Grass Pledge
Grass Pledge.effect: A column of grass hits opposing Pokémon. When used with its water equivalent, its damage increases into a vast swamp.

Volt Switch.name: Volt Switch
Volt Switch.effect: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Struggle Bug.name: Struggle Bug
Struggle Bug.effect: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets’ Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

Bulldoze.name: Bulldoze
Bulldoze.effect: The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon’s Speed stat is reduced.

Frost Breath.name: Frost Breath
Frost Breath.effect: The user blows a cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

Dragon Tail.name: Dragon Tail
Dragon Tail.effect: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

Electroweb.name: Electroweb
Electroweb.effect: The user captures and attacks opposing Pokémon by using an electric net. It reduces the targets’ Speed stat.

Wild Charge.name: Wild Charge
Wild Charge.effect: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. It also damages the user a little.

Drill Run.name: Drill Run
Drill Run.effect: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

Dual Chop.name: Dual Chop
Dual Chop.effect: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

Heart Stamp.name: Heart Stamp
Heart Stamp.effect: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. It may also make the target flinch.

Horn Leech.name: Horn Leech
Horn Leech.effect: The user drains the target’s energy with its horns. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Sacred Sword.name: Sacred Sword
Sacred Sword.effect: The user attacks by slicing with its long horns. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

Razor Shell.name: Razor Shell
Razor Shell.effect: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This attack may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

Heat Crash.name: Heat Crash
Heat Crash.effect: The user slams its target with its flame- covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the damage.

Leaf Tornado.name: Leaf Tornado
Leaf Tornado.effect: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the target’s accuracy.

Steamroller.name: Steamroller
Steamroller.effect: The user crushes its targets by rolling over them with its rolled-up body. This attack may make the target flinch.

Night Daze.name: Night Daze
Night Daze.effect: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

Psystrike.name: Psystrike
Psystrike.effect: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

Tail Slap.name: Tail Slap
Tail Slap.effect: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

Hurricane.name: Hurricane
Hurricane.effect: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target.

Head Charge.name: Head Charge
Head Charge.effect: The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. It also damages the user a little.

Gear Grind.name: Gear Grind
Gear Grind.effect: The user attacks by throwing two steel gears at its target.

Searing Shot.name: Searing Shot
Searing Shot.effect: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave targets with a burn.

Techno Blast.name: Techno Blast
Techno Blast.effect: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.

Relic Song.name: Relic Song
Relic Song.effect: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of those listening. It may also induce sleep.

Secret Sword.name: Secret Sword
Secret Sword.effect: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.

Glaciate.name: Glaciate
Glaciate.effect: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This attack reduces the targets’ Speed stat.

Bolt Strike.name: Bolt Strike
Bolt Strike.effect: The user charges its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. It may leave the target with paralysis.

Blue Flare.name: Blue Flare
Blue Flare.effect: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn.

Fiery Dance.name: Fiery Dance
Fiery Dance.effect: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

Freeze Shock.name: Freeze Shock
Freeze Shock.effect: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. It may leave the target with paralysis.

Ice Burn.name: Ice Burn
Ice Burn.effect: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.

Snarl.name: Snarl
Snarl.effect: The user yells as if it is ranting about something, making the target’s Sp. Atk stat decrease.

Icicle Crash.name: Icicle Crash
Icicle Crash.effect: The user attacks by harshly dropping an icicle onto the target. It may also make the target flinch.

V Create.name: V Create
V Create.effect: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. It lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

Fusion Flare.name: Fusion Flare
Fusion Flare.effect: The user brings down a giant flame. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous thunderbolt.

Fusion Bolt.name: Fusion Bolt
Fusion Bolt.effect: The user throws down a giant thunderbolt. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous flame.

Flying Press.name: Flying Press
Flying Press.effect: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

Belch.name: Belch
Belch.effect: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

Fell Stinger.name: Fell Stinger
Fell Stinger.effect: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises sharply.

Phantom Force.name: Phantom Force
Phantom Force.effect: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

Parabolic Charge.name: Parabolic Charge
Parabolic Charge.effect: The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

Petal Blizzard.name: Petal Blizzard
Petal Blizzard.effect: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

Freeze Dry.name: Freeze Dry
Freeze Dry.effect: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

Disarming Voice.name: Disarming Voice
Disarming Voice.effect: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

Draining Kiss.name: Draining Kiss
Draining Kiss.effect: The user steals the target’s energy with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

Play Rough.name: Play Rough
Play Rough.effect: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

Fairy Wind.name: Fairy Wind
Fairy Wind.effect: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

Moonblast.name: Moonblast
Moonblast.effect: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

Boomburst.name: Boomburst
Boomburst.effect: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

Diamond Storm.name: Diamond Storm
Diamond Storm.effect: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.

Steam Eruption.name: Steam Eruption
Steam Eruption.effect: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Hyperspace Hole.name: Hyperspace Hole
Hyperspace Hole.effect: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This also hits a target using Protect or Detect.

Water Shuriken.name: Water Shuriken
Water Shuriken.effect: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

Mystical Fire.name: Mystical Fire
Mystical Fire.effect: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

Dazzling Gleam.name: Dazzling Gleam
Dazzling Gleam.effect: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

Nuzzle.name: Nuzzle
Nuzzle.effect: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

Hold Back.name: Hold Back
Hold Back.effect: The user holds back when it attacks and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

Infestation.name: Infestation
Infestation.effect: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can’t flee during this time.

Power Up Punch.name: Power Up Punch
Power Up Punch.effect: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

Oblivion Wing.name: Oblivion Wing
Oblivion Wing.effect: The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

Thousand Arrows.name: Thousand Arrows
Thousand Arrows.effect: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.

Thousand Waves.name: Thousand Waves
Thousand Waves.effect: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those hit can’t flee from battle.

Lands Wrath.name: Lands Wrath
Lands Wrath.effect: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

Light Of Ruin.name: Light Of Ruin
Light Of Ruin.effect: Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the user quite a lot.

Origin Pulse.name: Origin Pulse
Origin Pulse.effect: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

Precipice Blades.name: Precipice Blades
Precipice Blades.effect: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

Dragon Ascent.name: Dragon Ascent
Dragon Ascent.effect: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds, although it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def in the process.

Hyperspace Fury.name: Hyperspace Fury
Hyperspace Fury.effect: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. This attack lowers the user’s Defense.

Breakneck Blitz Physical.name: Breakneck Blitz  Physical
Breakneck Blitz Physical.effect: The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power and crashes into the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

All Out Pummeling Physical.name: All Out Pummeling  Physical
All Out Pummeling Physical.effect: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power into the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Supersonic Skystrike Physical.name: Supersonic Skystrike  Physical
Supersonic Skystrike Physical.effect: The user soars up with its Z-Power and plummets toward the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Acid Downpour Physical.name: Acid Downpour  Physical
Acid Downpour Physical.effect: The user creates a poisonous swamp using its Z-Power and sinks the target into it at full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Tectonic Rage Physical.name: Tectonic Rage  Physical
Tectonic Rage Physical.effect: The user burrows deep into the ground and slams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Continental Crush Physical.name: Continental Crush  Physical
Continental Crush Physical.effect: The user summons a huge rock mountain using its Z-Power and drops it onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Savage Spin Out Physical.name: Savage Spin Out  Physical
Savage Spin Out Physical.effect: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Never Ending Nightmare Physical.name: Never Ending Nightmare  Physical
Never Ending Nightmare Physical.effect: Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user’s Z-Power trap the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Corkscrew Crash Physical.name: Corkscrew Crash  Physical
Corkscrew Crash Physical.effect: The user spins very fast and rams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Inferno Overdrive Physical.name: Inferno Overdrive  Physical
Inferno Overdrive Physical.effect: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.

Hydro Vortex Physical.name: Hydro Vortex  Physical
Hydro Vortex Physical.effect: The user creates a huge whirling current using its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Bloom Doom Physical.name: Bloom Doom  Physical
Bloom Doom Physical.effect: The user collects energy from plants using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Gigavolt Havoc Physical.name: Gigavolt Havoc  Physical
Gigavolt Havoc Physical.effect: The user hits the target with a powerful electric current collected by its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Shattered Psyche Physical.name: Shattered Psyche  Physical
Shattered Psyche Physical.effect: The user controls the target with its Z-Power and hurts the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Subzero Slammer Physical.name: Subzero Slammer  Physical
Subzero Slammer Physical.effect: The user dramatically drops the temperature using its Z-Power and freezes the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Devastating Drake Physical.name: Devastating Drake  Physical
Devastating Drake Physical.effect: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Black Hole Eclipse Physical.name: Black Hole Eclipse  Physical
Black Hole Eclipse Physical.effect: The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power and sucks the target into it. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Twinkle Tackle Physical.name: Twinkle Tackle  Physical
Twinkle Tackle Physical.effect: The user creates a very charming space using its Z-Power and totally toys with the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

Catastropika.name: Catastropika
Catastropika.effect: The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power and pounces on its target with full force.

First Impression.name: First Impression
First Impression.effect: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.

Spirit Shackle.name: Spirit Shackle
Spirit Shackle.effect: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.

Darkest Lariat.name: Darkest Lariat
Darkest Lariat.effect: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

Sparkling Aria.name: Sparkling Aria
Sparkling Aria.effect: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.

Ice Hammer.name: Ice Hammer
Ice Hammer.effect: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

High Horsepower.name: High Horsepower
High Horsepower.effect: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

Solar Blade.name: Solar Blade
Solar Blade.effect: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the target on the next turn.

Leafage.name: Leafage
Leafage.effect: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

Throat Chop.name: Throat Chop
Throat Chop.effect: The user attacks the target’s throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for two turns.

Pollen Puff.name: Pollen Puff
Pollen Puff.effect: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

Anchor Shot.name: Anchor Shot
Anchor Shot.effect: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

Lunge.name: Lunge
Lunge.effect: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

Fire Lash.name: Fire Lash
Fire Lash.effect: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

Power Trip.name: Power Trip
Power Trip.effect: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.

Burn Up.name: Burn Up
Burn Up.effect: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

Smart Strike.name: Smart Strike
Smart Strike.effect: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

Revelation Dance.name: Revelation Dance
Revelation Dance.effect: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.

Core Enforcer.name: Core Enforcer
Core Enforcer.effect: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

Trop Kick.name: Trop Kick
Trop Kick.effect: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

Beak Blast.name: Beak Blast
Beak Blast.effect: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it’s heating up its beak results in a burn.

Clanging Scales.name: Clanging Scales
Clanging Scales.effect: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon. The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.

Dragon Hammer.name: Dragon Hammer
Dragon Hammer.effect: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

Brutal Swing.name: Brutal Swing
Brutal Swing.effect: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

Sinister Arrow Raid.name: Sinister Arrow Raid
Sinister Arrow Raid.effect: The user, Decidueye, creates countless arrows using its Z-Power and shoots the target with full force.

Malicious Moonsault.name: Malicious Moonsault
Malicious Moonsault.effect: The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using its Z-Power and crashes into the target with full force.

Oceanic Operetta.name: Oceanic Operetta
Oceanic Operetta.effect: The user, Primarina, summons a massive amount of  water using its Z-Power and attacks the target with  full force.

Guardian Of Alola.name: Guardian Of Alola
Guardian Of Alola.effect: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.

Soul Stealing 7 Star Strike.name: Soul Stealing 7 Star Strike
Soul Stealing 7 Star Strike.effect: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow, punches and kicks the target consecutively with full force.

Stoked Sparksurfer.name: Stoked Sparksurfer
Stoked Sparksurfer.effect: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu, attacks the target with full force. This move leaves the target with paralysis.

Pulverizing Pancake.name: Pulverizing Pancake
Pulverizing Pancake.effect: Z-Power brings out the true capabilities of the user, Snorlax. The Pokémon moves its enormous body energetically and attacks the target with full force.

Genesis Supernova.name: Genesis Supernova
Genesis Supernova.effect: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mew, attacks the target with full force. The terrain will be charged with psychic energy.

Shell Trap.name: Shell Trap
Shell Trap.effect: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pokémon.

Fleur Cannon.name: Fleur Cannon
Fleur Cannon.effect: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

Psychic Fangs.name: Psychic Fangs
Psychic Fangs.effect: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

Stomping Tantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum
Stomping Tantrum.effect: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

Shadow Bone.name: Shadow Bone
Shadow Bone.effect: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

Accelerock.name: Accelerock
Accelerock.effect: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

Liquidation.name: Liquidation
Liquidation.effect: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

Prismatic Laser.name: Prismatic Laser
Prismatic Laser.effect: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.

Spectral Thief.name: Spectral Thief
Spectral Thief.effect: The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.

Sunsteel Strike.name: Sunsteel Strike
Sunsteel Strike.effect: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target  regardless of its Abilities.

Moongeist Beam.name: Moongeist Beam
Moongeist Beam.effect: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of  its Abilities.

Zing Zap.name: Zing Zap
Zing Zap.effect: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

Natures Madness.name: Natures Madness
Natures Madness.effect: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target’s HP.

Multi Attack.name: Multi Attack
Multi Attack.effect: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the target. The memory held determines the move’s type.

10 000 000 Volt Thunderbolt.name: 10 000 000 Volt Thunderbolt
10 000 000 Volt Thunderbolt.effect: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits land more easily.

Mind Blown.name: Mind Blown
Mind Blown.effect: The user attacks everything around it by causing its own head to explode. This also damages the user.

Plasma Fists.name: Plasma Fists
Plasma Fists.effect: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

Photon Geyser.name: Photon Geyser
Photon Geyser.effect: The user attacks a target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever stat is higher for the user.

Light That Burns The Sky.name: Light That Burns The Sky
Light That Burns The Sky.effect: This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage— whichever stat is higher for the user, Necrozma.  This move ignores the target’s Ability.

Searing Sunraze Smash.name: Searing Sunraze Smash
Searing Sunraze Smash.effect: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.

Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom.name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom
Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom.effect: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lunala, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.

Lets Snuggle Forever.name: Lets Snuggle Forever
Lets Snuggle Forever.effect: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mimikyu, punches the target with full force.

Splintered Stormshards.name: Splintered Stormshards
Splintered Stormshards.effect: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc, attacks the target with full force. This move negates the effect on the battlefield.

Clangorous Soulblaze.name: Clangorous Soulblaze
Clangorous Soulblaze.effect: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o, attacks the opposing Pokémon with full force. This move boosts the user’s stats.

Zippy Zap.name: Zippy Zap
Zippy Zap.effect: The user attacks the target with bursts of electricity at high speed. This move always goes first and results in a critical hit.

Splishy Splash.name: Splishy Splash
Splishy Splash.effect: The user charges a huge wave with electricity and hits the opposing Pokémon with the wave. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon with paralysis.

Floaty Fall.name: Floaty Fall
Floaty Fall.effect: The user floats in the air, and then dives at a steep angle to attack the target. This may also make the target flinch.

Pika Papow.name: Pika Papow
Pika Papow.effect: The more Pikachu loves its Trainer, the greater the move’s power. It never misses.

Bouncy Bubble.name: Bouncy Bubble
Bouncy Bubble.effect: The user attacks by shooting water bubbles at the target. It then absorbs water and restores its HP by half the damage taken by the target.

Buzzy Buzz.name: Buzzy Buzz
Buzzy Buzz.effect: The user shoots a jolt of electricity to attack the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

Sizzly Slide.name: Sizzly Slide
Sizzly Slide.effect: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This also leaves the target with a burn.

Glitzy Glow.name: Glitzy Glow
Glitzy Glow.effect: The user bombards the target with telekinetic force. A wondrous wall of light is put up to weaken the power of the opposing Pokémon’s special moves.

Baddy Bad.name: Baddy Bad
Baddy Bad.effect: The user acts bad and attacks the target. A wondrous wall of light is put up to weaken the power of the opposing Pokémon’s physical moves.

Sappy Seed.name: Sappy Seed
Sappy Seed.effect: The user grows a gigantic stalk that scatters seeds to attack the target. The seeds drain the target’s HP every turn.

Freezy Frost.name: Freezy Frost
Freezy Frost.effect: The user attacks with a crystal made of cold frozen haze. It eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

Sparkly Swirl.name: Sparkly Swirl
Sparkly Swirl.effect: The user attacks the target by wrapping it with a whirlwind of an overpowering scent. This also heals all status conditions of the user’s party.

Veevee Volley.name: Veevee Volley
Veevee Volley.effect: The more Eevee loves its Trainer, the greater the move’s power. It never misses.

Double Iron Bash.name: Double Iron Bash
Double Iron Bash.effect: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, and then strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.

Dynamax Cannon.name: Dynamax Cannon
Dynamax Cannon.effect: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

Snipe Shot.name: Snipe Shot
Snipe Shot.effect: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

Jaw Lock.name: Jaw Lock
Jaw Lock.effect: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

Dragon Darts.name: Dragon Darts
Dragon Darts.effect: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two targets, this move hits each target once.

Bolt Beak.name: Bolt Beak
Bolt Beak.effect: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

Fishious Rend.name: Fishious Rend
Fishious Rend.effect: The user rends the target with its hard gills. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

Max Flare.name: Max Flare
Max Flare.effect: This is a Fire-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user intensifies the sun for five turns.

Max Flutterby.name: Max Flutterby
Max Flutterby.effect: This is a Bug-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

Max Lightning.name: Max Lightning
Max Lightning.effect: This is an Electric-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns.

Max Strike.name: Max Strike
Max Strike.effect: This is a Normal-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Speed stat.

Max Knuckle.name: Max Knuckle
Max Knuckle.effect: This is a Fighting-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Attack stats.

Max Phantasm.name: Max Phantasm
Max Phantasm.effect: This is a Ghost-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Defense stat.

Max Hailstorm.name: Max Hailstorm
Max Hailstorm.effect: This is an Ice-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.

Max Ooze.name: Max Ooze
Max Ooze.effect: This is a Poison-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stats.

Max Geyser.name: Max Geyser
Max Geyser.effect: This is a Water-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns.

Max Airstream.name: Max Airstream
Max Airstream.effect: This is a Flying-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Speed stats.

Max Starfall.name: Max Starfall
Max Starfall.effect: This is a Fairy-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Misty Terrain for five turns.

Max Wyrmwind.name: Max Wyrmwind
Max Wyrmwind.effect: This is a Dragon-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Attack stat.

Max Mindstorm.name: Max Mindstorm
Max Mindstorm.effect: This is a Psychic-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Psychic Terrain for five turns.

Max Rockfall.name: Max Rockfall
Max Rockfall.effect: This is a Rock-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a sandstorm lasting five turns.

Max Quake.name: Max Quake
Max Quake.effect: This is a Ground-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Sp. Def stats.

Max Darkness.name: Max Darkness
Max Darkness.effect: This is a Dark-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

Max Overgrowth.name: Max Overgrowth
Max Overgrowth.effect: This is a Grass-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns.

Max Steelspike.name: Max Steelspike
Max Steelspike.effect: This is a Steel-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Defense stats.

Body Press.name: Body Press
Body Press.effect: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user’s Defense, the more damage it can inflict on the target.

Drum Beating.name: Drum Beating
Drum Beating.effect: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum’s roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

Snap Trap.name: Snap Trap
Snap Trap.effect: The user snares the target in a snap trap for four to five turns.

Pyro Ball.name: Pyro Ball
Pyro Ball.effect: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Behemoth Blade.name: Behemoth Blade
Behemoth Blade.effect: The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

Behemoth Bash.name: Behemoth Bash
Behemoth Bash.effect: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

Aura Wheel.name: Aura Wheel
Aura Wheel.effect: Morpeko attacks and raises its Speed with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move’s type changes depending on the user’s form.

Breaking Swipe.name: Breaking Swipe
Breaking Swipe.effect: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

Branch Poke.name: Branch Poke
Branch Poke.effect: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

Overdrive.name: Overdrive
Overdrive.effect: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

Apple Acid.name: Apple Acid
Apple Acid.effect: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

Grav Apple.name: Grav Apple
Grav Apple.effect: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

Spirit Break.name: Spirit Break
Spirit Break.effect: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target’s spirit. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

Strange Steam.name: Strange Steam
Strange Steam.effect: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.

False Surrender.name: False Surrender
False Surrender.effect: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

Meteor Assault.name: Meteor Assault
Meteor Assault.effect: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. The user can’t move on the next turn, because the force of this move makes it stagger.

Eternabeam.name: Eternabeam
Eternabeam.effect: This is Eternatus’s most powerful attack in its original form. The user can’t move on the next turn.

Steel Beam.name: Steel Beam
Steel Beam.effect: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.

Expanding Force.name: Expanding Force
Expanding Force.effect: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. This move’s power goes up and damages all opposing Pokémon on Psychic Terrain.

Steel Roller.name: Steel Roller
Steel Roller.effect: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails when the ground hasn’t turned into a terrain.

Scale Shot.name: Scale Shot
Scale Shot.effect: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user’s Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.

Meteor Beam.name: Meteor Beam
Meteor Beam.effect: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers space power and boosts its Sp. Atk stat, then attacks the target on the next turn.

Shell Side Arm.name: Shell Side Arm
Shell Side Arm.effect: This move inflicts physical or special damage, whichever will be more effective. This may also poison the target.

Misty Explosion.name: Misty Explosion
Misty Explosion.effect: The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move’s power is increased on Misty Terrain.

Grassy Glide.name: Grassy Glide
Grassy Glide.effect: Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.

Rising Voltage.name: Rising Voltage
Rising Voltage.effect: The user attacks with electric voltage rising from the ground. This move’s power doubles when the target is on Electric Terrain.

Terrain Pulse.name: Terrain Pulse
Terrain Pulse.effect: The user utilizes the power of the terrain to attack. This move’s type and power changes depending on the terrain when it’s used.

Skitter Smack.name: Skitter Smack
Skitter Smack.effect: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

Burning Jealousy.name: Burning Jealousy
Burning Jealousy.effect: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.

Lash Out.name: Lash Out
Lash Out.effect: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. If the user’s stats were lowered during this turn, the power of this move is doubled.

Poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
Poltergeist.effect: The user attacks the target by controlling the target’s item. The move fails if the target doesn’t have an item.

Flip Turn.name: Flip Turn
Flip Turn.effect: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Triple Axel.name: Triple Axel
Triple Axel.effect: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

Dual Wingbeat.name: Dual Wingbeat
Dual Wingbeat.effect: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.

Scorching Sands.name: Scorching Sands
Scorching Sands.effect: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Wicked Blow.name: Wicked Blow
Wicked Blow.effect: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

Surging Strikes.name: Surging Strikes
Surging Strikes.effect: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This attack always results in a critical hit.

Thunder Cage.name: Thunder Cage
Thunder Cage.effect: The user traps the target in a cage of sparking electricity for four to five turns.

Dragon Energy.name: Dragon Energy
Dragon Energy.effect: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.

Freezing Glare.name: Freezing Glare
Freezing Glare.effect: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.

Fiery Wrath.name: Fiery Wrath
Fiery Wrath.effect: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.

Thunderous Kick.name: Thunderous Kick
Thunderous Kick.effect: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

Glacial Lance.name: Glacial Lance
Glacial Lance.effect: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

Astral Barrage.name: Astral Barrage
Astral Barrage.effect: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

Eerie Spell.name: Eerie Spell
Eerie Spell.effect: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also removes 3 PP from the target’s last move.

Dire Claw.name: Dire Claw
Dire Claw.effect: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws, aiming to land a critical hit. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or drowsy.

Psyshield Bash.name: Psyshield Bash
Psyshield Bash.effect: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This may also raise the user’s defensive stats.

Stone Axe.name: Stone Axe
Stone Axe.effect: The user swings its stone axes at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Stone splinters left behind by this attack continue to damage the target for several turns.

Springtide Storm.name: Springtide Storm
Springtide Storm.effect: The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds brimming with love and hate. This move’s additional effects depend on the user’s form.

Mystical Power.name: Mystical Power
Mystical Power.effect: The user strengthens itself with a mysterious power. If it excels in offense, its offensive stats are raised. If it excels in defense, its defensive stats are raised.

Raging Fury.name: Raging Fury
Raging Fury.effect: The user rampages and spews vicious flames to inflict damage on the target, then becomes fixated on using this move.

Wave Crash.name: Wave Crash
Wave Crash.effect: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user and raises the user’s action speed.

Chloroblast.name: Chloroblast
Chloroblast.effect: The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user and lowers the user's action speed.

Mountain Gale.name: Mountain Gale
Mountain Gale.effect: The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage.

Headlong Rush.name: Headlong Rush
Headlong Rush.effect: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user’s defensive stats.

Barb Barrage.name: Barb Barrage
Barb Barrage.effect: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move’s power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

Esper Wing.name: Esper Wing
Esper Wing.effect: The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This also raises the user's action speed. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Bitter Malice.name: Bitter Malice
Bitter Malice.effect: The user attacks its target with spine-chilling resentment. This may also leave the target with frostbite. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

Triple Arrows.name: Triple Arrows
Triple Arrows.effect: The user delivers an axe kick, then fires three arrows. This raises the chance of its future attacks landing critical hits and also lowers the target's defensive stats.

Infernal Parade.name: Infernal Parade
Infernal Parade.effect: The user attacks with myriad fireballs. This may also leave the target with a burn. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

Ceaseless Edge.name: Ceaseless Edge
Ceaseless Edge.effect: The user slashes its shell blade at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Shell splinters left behind by this attack will continue to damage the target for several turns.

Bleakwind Storm.name: Bleakwind Storm
Bleakwind Storm.effect: The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also leave the target with frostbite.

Wildbolt Storm.name: Wildbolt Storm
Wildbolt Storm.effect: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Sandsear Storm.name: Sandsear Storm
Sandsear Storm.effect: The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This also leaves the target with a burn.

Tera Blast.name: Tera Blast
Tera Blast.effect: If the user has Terastallized, it unleashes energy of its Tera Type. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever is higher for the user.

Axe Kick.name: Axe Kick
Axe Kick.effect: The user attacks by kicking up into the air and slamming its heel down upon the target. This may also confuse the target. If it misses, the user takes damage instead.

Last Respects.name: Last Respects
Last Respects.effect: The user attacks to avenge its allies. The more defeated allies there are in the user's party, the greater the move's power.

Lumina Crash.name: Lumina Crash
Lumina Crash.effect: The user attacks by unleashing a peculiar light that even affects the mind. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

Order Up.name: Order Up
Order Up.effect: The user attacks with elegant poise. If the user has a Tatsugiri in its mouth, this move boosts one of the user's stats based on the Tatsugiri's form.

Jet Punch.name: Jet Punch
Jet Punch.effect: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

Spin Out.name: Spin Out
Spin Out.effect: The user spins furiously by straining its legs, inflicting damage on the target. This also harshly lowers the user's Speed stat.

Population Bomb.name: Population Bomb
Population Bomb.effect: The user’s fellows gather in droves to perform a combo attack that hits the target one to ten times in a row.

Ice Spinner.name: Ice Spinner
Ice Spinner.effect: The user covers its feet in thin ice and twirls around, slamming into the target. This move's spinning motion also destroys the terrain.

Glaive Rush.name: Glaive Rush
Glaive Rush.effect: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. After this move is used, attacks on the user cannot miss and will inflict double damage until the user’s next turn.

Salt Cure.name: Salt Cure
Salt Cure.effect: The user salt cures the target, inflicting damage every turn. Steel and Water types are more strongly affected by this move.

Triple Dive.name: Triple Dive
Triple Dive.effect: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting the target with splashes of water three times in a row.

Mortal Spin.name: Mortal Spin
Mortal Spin.effect: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also poisons opposing Pokémon.

Kowtow Cleave.name: Kowtow Cleave
Kowtow Cleave.effect: The user slashes at the target after kowtowing to make the target let down its guard. This attack never misses.

Flower Trick.name: Flower Trick
Flower Trick.effect: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target. This attack never misses and always lands a critical hit.

Torch Song.name: Torch Song
Torch Song.effect: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song, scorching the target. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Aqua Step.name: Aqua Step
Aqua Step.effect: The user toys with the target and attacks it using light and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

Raging Bull.name: Raging Bull
Raging Bull.effect: The user performs a tackle like a raging bull. This move's type depends on the user's form. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

Make It Rain.name: Make It Rain
Make It Rain.effect: The user attacks by throwing out a mass of coins. This also lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat. Money is earned after the battle.

Psyblade.name: Psyblade
Psyblade.effect: The user rends the target with an ethereal blade. This move's power is boosted by 50 percent if the user is on Electric Terrain.

Hydro Steam.name: Hydro Steam
Hydro Steam.effect: The user blasts the target with boiling-hot water. This move's power is not lowered in harsh sunlight but rather boosted by 50 percent.

Ruination.name: Ruination
Ruination.effect: The user summons a ruinous disaster. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

Collision Course.name: Collision Course
Collision Course.effect: The user transforms and crashes to the ground, causing a massive prehistoric explosion. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it’s a supereffective hit.

Electro Drift.name: Electro Drift
Electro Drift.effect: The user races forward at ultrafast speeds, piercing its target with futuristic electricity. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.effect: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

Trailblaze.name: Trailblaze
Trailblaze.effect: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass. The user's nimble footwork boosts its Speed stat.

Chilling Water.name: Chilling Water
Chilling Water.effect: The user attacks the target by showering it with water that's so cold it saps the target's power. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

Hyper Drill.name: Hyper Drill
Hyper Drill.effect: The user spins the pointed part of its body at high speed to pierce the target. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

Twin Beam.name: Twin Beam
Twin Beam.effect: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

Rage Fist.name: Rage Fist
Rage Fist.effect: The user converts its rage into energy to attack. The more times the user has been hit by attacks, the greater the move's power.

Armor Cannon.name: Armor Cannon
Armor Cannon.effect: The user shoots its own armor out as blazing projectiles. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Bitter Blade.name: Bitter Blade
Bitter Blade.effect: The user focuses its bitter feelings toward the world of the living into a slashing attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

Double Shock.name: Double Shock
Double Shock.effect: The user discharges all the electricity from its body to perform a high-damage attack. After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

Gigaton Hammer.name: Gigaton Hammer
Gigaton Hammer.effect: The user swings its whole body around to attack with its huge hammer. This move can't be used twice in a row.

Comeuppance.name: Comeuppance
Comeuppance.effect: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

Aqua Cutter.name: Aqua Cutter
Aqua Cutter.effect: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Blood Moon.name: Blood Moon
Blood Moon.effect: The user unleashes the full brunt of its spirit from a full moon that shines as red as blood. This move can't be used twice in a row.

Matcha Gotcha.name: Matcha Gotcha
Matcha Gotcha.effect: The user fires a blast of tea that it mixed. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Syrup Bomb.name: Syrup Bomb
Syrup Bomb.effect: The user sets off an explosion of sticky candy syrup, which coats the target and causes the target's Speed stat to drop each turn for three turns.

Ivy Cudgel.name: Ivy Cudgel
Ivy Cudgel.effect: The user strikes with an ivy-wrapped cudgel. This move's type changes depending on the mask worn by the user, and it has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Electro Shot.name: Electro Shot
Electro Shot.effect: The user gathers electricity on the first turn, boosting its Sp. Atk stat, then fires a high-voltage shot on the next turn. The shot will be fired immediately in rain.

Tera Starstorm.name: Tera Starstorm
Tera Starstorm.effect: With the power of its crystals, the user bombards and eliminates the target. When used by Terapagos in its Stellar Form, this move damages all opposing Pokémon.

Fickle Beam.name: Fickle Beam
Fickle Beam.effect: The user shoots a beam of light to inflict damage. Sometimes all the user's heads shoot beams in unison, doubling the move's power.

Thunderclap.name: Thunderclap
Thunderclap.effect: This move enables the user to attack first with a jolt of electricity. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

Mighty Cleave.name: Mighty Cleave
Mighty Cleave.effect: The user wields the light that has accumulated atop its head to cleave the target. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

Tachyon Cutter.name: Tachyon Cutter
Tachyon Cutter.effect: The user attacks by launching particle blades at the target twice in a row. This attack never misses.

Hard Press.name: Hard Press
Hard Press.effect: The target is crushed with an arm, a claw, or the like to inflict damage. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.

Alluring Voice.name: Alluring Voice
Alluring Voice.effect: The user attacks the target using its angelic voice. This also confuses the target if its stats have been boosted during the turn.

Temper Flare.name: Temper Flare
Temper Flare.effect: Spurred by desperation, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

Supercell Slam.name: Supercell Slam
Supercell Slam.effect: The user electrifies its body and drops onto the target to inflict damage. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

Psychic Noise.name: Psychic Noise
Psychic Noise.effect: The user attacks the target with unpleasant sound waves. For two turns, the target is prevented from recovering HP through moves, Abilities, or held items.

Upper Hand.name: Upper Hand
Upper Hand.effect: The user reacts to the target's movement and strikes with the heel of its palm, making the target flinch. This move fails if the target is not readying a priority move.

Malignant Chain.name: Malignant Chain
Malignant Chain.effect: The user pours toxins into the target by wrapping them in a toxic, corrosive chain. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.
